author.description: Kyle Flemmer | writer, publisher, digital media artist | http://objkt.com/profile/kflemmer

text: from "a peal of thunder, a moment of" by katie o'brien. concrete poetry chopping up Beethoven’s “Moonlight Sonata” and layering the staves to make them impossible to read. a meditation on memory, grief, notation, and music as a marker of time.
